Intro.content: Today we combine our previous ideas.
We provide a personal goal and mix in some conflict to spice things up.
The test subject needs more branches for shelter. And coconuts for food.
We want to make this challenging by interposing some predators.

Complete - Slow.content: Well that was a rough time for our test subject.

Complete - Fast.content: Quick and easy for the test subject.

Outro.content: Through combining goals and conflict, we instilled
a feeling of separation for the test subject.
They had to fend for themselves and fight of the others
